leeward.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the leeward side of something is the side that is sheltered from the wind
leeward.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: We camped on the leeward side of the mountain.
leeward.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a leeward direction is the same direction as the wind is blowing
leeward.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The ship cruised slowly to leeward.
